title: Should we recite Surah Fatiha after the imam finishes reciting it in Taraweeh? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: this is an issue of dispute the most authentic opinion without going into details is the opinion of imam malik may allah have mercy on his soul when he said that praying or reciting the fatiha in loud prayers is not mandatory it's up to you as long as the imam has recited it loudly this is sufficient for you and this is the opinion of islam and others you
